mapper.insert: insert into event(event_num, company_id, title, content, create_date, start_date, end_date) values (#{eventNum}, #{companyId},#{eventTitle},#{eventContent},#{eveCreDate},#{eveStartDate},#{eveEndDate})
mapper.update: update event set event_num = #{eventNum}, title = #{eventTitle},content = #{eventContent}, create_date = #{eveCreDate}, start_date = #{eveStartDate}, end_date = #{eveEndDate} where company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: select event_num, company_id, title, content , create_date , start_date, end_date from event
select count(*) as cnt from event where company_id = #{companyId}
